name: ICDEV Supply Chain
description: Supply chain intelligence — upstream/downstream impact propagation, SBOM aggregation, ISA lifecycle, CVE triage, NIST 800-161 SCRM.

skills.name: Build Dependency Graph
skills.description: Build supply chain dependency graph with upstream/downstream relationships.

skills.name: Propagate Impact
skills.description: Propagate vulnerability or change impact through dependency graph.

skills.name: Manage ISA Lifecycle
skills.description: ISA/MOU lifecycle tracking — create, expiring, review due, renew, revoke.

skills.name: Triage CVE
skills.description: CVE triage with blast radius analysis and SLA tracking.

skills.name: Assess SCRM
skills.description: NIST 800-161 supply chain risk assessment across 6 dimensions.
